idea:

We are well furnished with the imperative offices which help us in obliging the enormous scope orders inside the set time period. Likewise, we can gracefully the food items in viable bundling to guarantee safe conveyance alongside guaranteed quality and enduring taste.
For the most part the principle business of DIJON AGRO EXPORTS INDIA is:
1.    To carry on the business of manufacturing, processing, retail and wholesale trade, and export of all types of spices including chili, chili flakes, turmeric, coriander and various typesâ€™ dry masalas production and repackaging. All types of chutney, fruit pulp, fruit jam, jelly, sauce, syrups and juice, dry and fresh vegetable along with various types of dehydrated vegetable and their dried powder and masala.

idea:
Preetikaya Lifestyle Solutions Pvt Ltd, started work in early 2015, and began operations after FSSAI and other licenses and R&D.  Preetikaya works with stevia based sugar free sweeteners, and Low usage sugar alternatives. 

A manufacturing set up for Sugar Free Stevia sachets and tablets is functional in Mumbai and caters to the in-patient requirements of Corporate hospitals in Mumbai.

A novel Extra Sweet stevia based sugar is filed for patent by me (Preeti Sathaye) and approval is expected soon.
name: PREETIKAYA LIFESTYLE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
